name: Modulizer
description:
Modulizer is a 2D top down adventure shooter game where you must find modules to upgrade your player and eventually slay the boss. 

The game is inspired by Binding of Isaac. 

Keep in mind, this game is set to be somewhat difficult until you learn the map.

  • WASD/Arrow Keys - Move
  • Mouse - Aim
  • Mouse 0 (left click) - Shoot
  • Mouse Drag - Install module (only works on modules)

This game was made by the following people:

  • Ben Nilsson (programmer) - @BenNilsson97
  • Oliver Parrish (art) - @OliverParrish13
  • Cathan Bertram (sound, level design) - @BertramCathan
